description: Contains lab-specific information about notes. Only notes associated with labs, which are notes (HNOs) with a Note Type (I HNO 50) value of 81-Lab, are included.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note record.

columns.name: LAB_NOTE_SUB_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Lab type for this note.  Only Lab notes have a value populated for this item.


May contain organization-specific values: No
